Portfolio / Palma
Brand Identity 2024

Palma Event Planning & Management

Creating Memorable Moments, One Detail at a Time.

Scroll to explore

Client

Palma

Industry

Event Planning & Management

Services

Full Identity System, Logo Design, Stationery & Digital Assets

Year

2024

Project Overview

Distinctive events. Inspired by creativity, delivered with precision. Crafting powerful brand identities is at the heart of what I do. From strategy to symbol, I've developed standout logos and full identity systems for a diverse range of clients—shaping how brands are seen, remembered, and trusted. Each mark begins with deep research and creative exploration, ensuring it's more than just a logo—it's a foundation for lasting brand value

The Challenge

01

The primary challenge was to develop a standout logo and a full, cohesive identity system for a diverse range of clients. The identity needed to be a strong foundation that would shape how the Palma brand is perceived, remembered, and trusted in a competitive market. The goal was to create lasting brand value by capturing a character that was simultaneously creative, modern, and welcoming.

The Creative Solution

02

The Palma logo was designed to feature a contemporary, geometric typeface subtly integrated with palm leaf motifs. This combination symbolizes core brand values: growth, nature, and a strong connection to the brand's roots.

A bold turquoise palette was chosen for its sense of freshness, creativity, and approachability, perfectly reflecting Palma's innovative spirit. To ensure consistency, this identity was meticulously applied across all brand touchpoints, from stationery and business cards to digital assets and promotional materials, ensuring that every interaction captures Palma's unique character: creative, modern, and always striving for excellence.
